txt.en:
'The text you recovered told of an evil woman of the Hillmen who betrayed her tribe to serve the False King. Now she dwells within Minas Agar, commanding the Angmarim who pledge allegiance to the Iron Crown.

'Is this a legend of old or are these the words of truth? That I cannot say, but Mordirith's servants are many and powerful...I do not doubt these claims.

'You should investigate the matter. Return to Minas Agar and strike its gates. Should this fabled champion exist, she would be ill-advised to ignore such a challenge.'
'The Angmarim are fierce warriors without mercy, but they respect a show of strength. You defeated their champion in battle, and they will never forget this.'
'That text you hold should summon the Angmarim champion.'
Lindir translated the text you found from the Black Speech into Westron.
Summon and defeat Minas Agar's Champion
Minas Agar stands on the western side of Barad Gularan, south of Gath Forthn√≠r.\n\nYou must travel to Barad Gularan and issue a challenge to the Angmarim within Minas Agar.

Lindir is in the Fire Hall in Rivendell in the Trollshaws, far to the south.\n\nYou travelled to the Minas Agar and called out its champion. After a difficult battle, you defeated her. You should bring news of your victory to Lindir.
